TopicTitle: Question about the contract Explore Eve

Articles.Content:
Hello kerbonauts! I haven't played for a long time and I've forgotten. Tell me, to fulfill the career contract "explore Eve", where is an unmanned satellite enough in the task "fly near Eve"? Or should it be a manned flight? The terms of the contract do not say anything about this.
The transfer window for a manned flight will not be soon, and I can launch an unmanned satellite for the sake of just flying nearby right now.
If it doesn't specify, any craft which flies within the required distance of Eve will count.

25 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

If it doesn't specify, any craft which flies within the required distance of Eve will count.

Thanks. The satellite, without waiting for a response, has already launched 6 hours ago. Flying, hung with antennas. It will then be a repeater, then hang out somewhere in the boundless space.
